name: THERE AND BACK - THE SHOW
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD  = move
Left Mouse = attack
Right Mouse = dash
Tab = base finder

DESCRIPTION:
BINGE WATCH THE ALL NEW SEASON OF "THERE AND BACK!" -- A gameshow where contestants forage a savage planet for the opportunity to return home

Each day both contestants must venture out "THERE" to collect gems and then return "BACK" to base before running out of oxygen.

Why do the contestants need these gems? To upgrade and train their super killer alien battle pet of course! I mean, they could use their gems on themselves, but that's not going to help them in the epic 1v1 alien vs alien winner takes all show down.

Yes that's right! After 5 days of collecting gems, both contestants aliens will fight each other. The winner get's to go back to Earth. The loser gets eaten by BlobbyBlob TentacleThing!


This game was made in 1 week for the VimJam!
